content: निषेकः {@--1@} Sprinkling, infusion; सुखसलिलनिषेकः <ls>Rs. 1. 28.</ls> {@--2@} Dripping, trickling, distilling; तैलनिषेकबिंदुना <ls>R. 8. 38</ls> ‘a drop of dripping oil.’ {@--3@} Effusion, discharge. {@--4@} Seminal effusion or discharge, infusion of semen, impregnation, seed; <ls>Ku. 3. 16</ls>; <ls>R. 14. 60.</ls> {@--5@} The ceremony performed upon impregnation. {@--6@} Irrigation. {@--7@} Water for washing. {@--8@} Seminal impurity. {@--9@} Dirty water.
